ref: 9029 plúṣi m. ʻ a partic. noxious insect, (prob.) flea ʼ RV. 2. *pruṣi -- 3. *pruci -- . 4. *pricu -- . 5. *priṣu -- . 6. *praṣu -- (or *prāṣu -- : X prāśú -- ʻ very quick ʼ RV.??). [Variety of forms due to alteration, throu h taboo, of the name of a noxious insect, as in other IE. languages EWA ii 386 with lit. -- See Add.]
